Package org.arl.fjage.remote

Class MasterContainer

java.lang.Object
org.arl.fjage.Container
org.arl.fjage.remote.MasterContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionListener
public class MasterContainer extends Container implements ConnectionListener
Master container supporting multiple remote slave containers. Agents in linked master and slave containers function as if they were in the same container, i.e., are able to communicate with each other through messaging, topics and directory services.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Gets the TCP port on which the master container listens for connections.
      Returns:
      port on which the container's TCP server runs, -1 if none.

    • addConnector

      public void addConnector(Connector conn)
      Adds a connector over which the master container listens. The connector uses a firewall acquired from the firewall supplier configured for the container.
      Parameters:
      conn - connector.

    • addConnector

      public void addConnector(Connector conn, Firewall fw)
      Adds a connector over which the master container listens, but with a custom firewall for that connector.
      Parameters:
      conn - connector.
      fw - firewall.

    • getConnectors

      public String[] getConnectors()
      Gets a list of connector URLs that slaves can use to access the master container.

    • getConnectionHandlers

      public ConnectionHandler[] getConnectionHandlers()

      Returns:
      array of connection handlers.

    • send

      public boolean send(Message m)
      Description copied from class: Container
      Sends a message. The message is sent to the recipient specified in the message. In case of associated remote containers, the message is only delivered to agents in this container.
      Overrides:
      send in class Container
      Parameters:
      m - message to deliver
      Returns:
      true if delivered, false otherwise.

    • send

      public boolean send(Message m, boolean relay)
      Description copied from class: Container
      Sends a message. The message is sent to the recipient specified in the message.
      Overrides:
      send in class Container
      Parameters:
      m - message to deliver
      relay - enable relaying to associated remote containers.
      Returns:
      true if delivered, false otherwise.
